role.name: Newsletter
role.description: Regular or irregular delivery of a newsletter by electronic means. The newsletter contains information and news about products, services, community and the ecosystem. Newsletter content may be personalized by using the data from user profile.

role.name: Personalized user experience
role.description: User interaction of company web sites may use information from the user profile to personalize user experience.

role.name: Usage statistics
role.description: Data controller may observe user behavior and gather statistical data that may be combined with personal data from user profile.

role.name: Partner network information exchange
role.description: Limited scope of user personal data may be shared with selected members of the partner network.
